channel.title: Is there a way to update the shops.cfg, items.cfg etc w/o restarting?
channel.description:
I know there has to be a way to make a command so when you update the shops, items, autospawns, all the cfg's etc that you can do it without restarting the server? People on my server get pissed when I keep doing rolling restarts because I am updating something one by one.
Much Appriciated!!!

item.title: Is there a way to update the shops.cfg, items.cfg etc w/o restarting?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

yes u can reload cfg files without restarting server

as in dodian like has

	misc.print("Loading npcs... ");
	loadNPCList("npc.cfg");
	misc.print("drops... ");
	loadNPCDrops("npcdrops.cfg");
	misc.print("spawn list...");
	loadAutoSpawn("autospawn.cfg");
	misc.println("done!");

all you have to do is make a command like

if(cmd.startsWith(“reload”)) {
misc.print("Loading npcs… ");
NPCHandler.loadNPCList(“npc.cfg”);
misc.print("drops… ");
NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(“npcdrops.cfg”);
misc.print(“spawn list…”);
NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(“autospawn.cfg”);
misc.println(“done!”);

//shops
ShopHandler.loadShops(“shops.cfg”);
ItemHandler.loadItemList(“item.cfg”);
ItemHandler.loadDrops(“globaldrops.cfg”);
ObjectHandler.loadObjects(“objects.cfg”);
DoorHandler.loadDoors(“doors.cfg”);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Is there a way to update the shops.cfg, items.cfg etc w/o restarting?

No, not for CFG. only if you edit a Java file do you need to compile.
